title: Japan: the bamboo bends and does not break

description: Episode of Series "Asian insight". Provides insight into the historical and cultural background of Japan, drawing attention to the sense of duty and obligation held by the Japanese in ways that are different from people in the West. Photography by Dean Semler. Unit Manager: Damien Parer.
